ScheatorDb.DbObject< Object, T >.Data

ScheatorDb.DbObject< Object, T >.Data Class Reference

This class holds the actual data retrieved from the database. Each class needs to define this themselves. Each field retrieved directly from the database needs to have the "field_" prefix. More...

Collaboration diagram for ScheatorDb.DbObject< Object, T >.Data:

Package Attributes

Integer field_id
String field_name
FieldState state = FieldState.SAVED

Detailed Description

This class holds the actual data retrieved from the database. Each class needs to define this themselves. Each field retrieved directly from the database needs to have the "field_" prefix.

The actual data for this class.

Definition at line 50 of file DbObject.java.

Member Function Documentation

Object ScheatorDb.DbObject< Object, T >.Data.get ( String  field  ) 

Returns the value of a field.

This method uses reflection to determine the field where the value will be retrieved.

Parameters:
field Field name.
Returns:
Value of the field.
